name: Explorers (Alpha)
description:
In this game, you will form a party with 3 out of 8 possible adventurers of your choice. Each of them has unique stats and ability of its own. This party will then be put to the test in a procedurally generated dungeon where they will die to traps and monsters attack or push through to the exit. You might find some gear along the way to help you fight off the evil of this place.

PLEASE KEEP IN MIND THAT THIS PROJECT IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

I want to add more classes, more items, more room events, more floors, monster scaling with time, item/monster/adventurer balance and more.

Feel free to leave a comment with your opinion, anything is greatly appreciated.
